title: How do I control the size of my wallpaper photo?
content:
I'm trying to use a picture I took as my wallpaper.  When I add it, the pic gets blown way up, so it's just a close up of ~25% of the image.  How can I make it show the full image?

I'm using a pixel 3
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
